### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(-6.0, 24.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler(position (-6.0, 24.5)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position ((40.0, -82.0))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position ((45.0, -83.0))
-  Furnace at position ((42.0, -81.0)) 
-  Furnace at position ((45.0, -80.0)) 
-  Furnace at position ((40.0, -79.0))

### Iron plate storage at position(43.5, -82.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position (43.5, -82.5)) 
-  Chest (position (40.5, -80.5)) 
-  Chest (position (43.5, -81.5))
-  Chest (position (-16.5, -49.5))
-  Chest (position (2.5, 0.5))
-  Chest (position (0.5, 2.5))

### Inserter system at position(0.5, 3.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) and a chest at position ((0.5, 2.5))
-  Burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) and a chest at position ((2.5, 0.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure the lab has the required items to start research before setting research
### Errors when inserting items
-  Make sure the entity can accept the item being inserted
-  Ensure the inserter has the required items to insert
### Errors when extracting items
-  Ensure the entity contains the item being extracted
-  Ensure the chest is not full before extracting items
### Errors when using inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has fuel to operate
-  Ensure the inserter is not waiting for source items
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before placing
### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure the boiler has fuel to operate
### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe
### Errors when using steam engine
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a pipe and has input liquid
